summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3103 for the improvement of the Alley in Block Five (5), Pettit-Brown Lakeview Addition, and the Alley as established by Ordinance No. 36586 through Block One (1), C. P. Dose's Lake Washington Addition and uplatted strip adjoining, being the alley between Thirty-third Avenue South and Thirty-fourth Avenue South, and between Plum Street and Dose Terrace, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37779, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
